title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: NEAR Sinks 3.1% as Index Trades Lower From Wednesday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Avalanche (AVAX) was also an underperformer, dropping 2.6%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3191.13, down 1.0% (-32.82) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

Three of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: APT (+1.3%) and AAVE (+0.9%).

Laggards: NEAR (-3.1%) and AVAX (-2.6%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is down 1.0% with most assets trading lower and only three of twenty assets showing gains.
